hackathon-description-text: MLH Local Hack Day is a 12 hour hack day on your school's campus that brings together the local hacker community to celebrate building awesome technology. On December 2nd 2017, students around the world will be simultaneously hosting their own MLH Local Hack Day at their school, resulting in the single largest day of student hacking ever.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Associate Professor of Computer Science at The University of Alabama

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Amazon gift credit of $40 to be evenly distributed amongst team via email codes.
Voted on by your peers- make sure to get +1s on Devpost!
